author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Step toward implementation of partial wafers. Modification to xml files for HGCal and HFNose. The changes has no effect on existing workflows. Since it is for Phase2 for which no payload is made for DB, these changes are safe.

#### PR validation:

Tested using standard runTheMatrix.py

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-hgx229 Update xml files to accommodate some implementation of partial wafers
